QuestData.Title: Cannons of Rage
QuestData.Description: There is a second production facility, Forge Camp: Rage, that lies to the immediate northeast of Thrallmar. The demons have positioned a number of their fel cannons along the ridge - and they're aimed straight at us! You must enter the camp and destroy these fel cannons. $B$B$n, you must be sure to detonate them all - or nothing will stop the Legion from raining fiery hell down upon our heads!
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy 3 Fel Cannon MKIs in Forge Camp: Rage and return to Nazgrel in Thrallmar.
QuestData.CompletionText: The Legion could start shelling us at any time, $N! You need to destroy those blasted cannons!
QuestData.RewardText: I knew you had spirit, $N, but you've outdone yourself this time! We heard those wretched cannons exploding from here! That should teach the Legion not to underestimate the Sons of Durotar!
